content: null is a special Java literal which represents a null value: a value which does not refer to any object. It is an error to attempt to dereference the null value — Java will throw a NullPointerException. null is often used to represent uninitialized state.
stemmed: null special java liter repres null valu : valu refer object . It error attempt derefer null valu — java throw nullpointerexcept . null often use repres uniniti state .
